resources.string: Enter a name for the entry
Provide a description for the entry
Enter what you said to the client
Enter what the client said to you
Automate sending reports to Christina by tapping a button you have created
Add a button by clicking the plus icon. You will be allowed to decide what information is sent when the button is tapped.
Once created, tap on a button to send its associated information to Christina.
Press and hold down on a button to access the modify screen. You can change the name, the information that will be sent, the color, or even delete the button by accessing the modify screen.
Client Communication will allow you to log conversations with the client.
Add note will allow you to submit information about special events. You can send one-time events and even take a picture to send with the report.
This app was created by Sara Olivero, Scott Tolman and Pedro Lago. It is designed to help Christina\'s co-workers to send reports about their interactions with the client.
